definition: to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather
color/complexion/looks/variant of 彩[cai3]/variant of 採|采[cai3]

sentences.english: The glazed roof supported by latticed shell has been widely used in many kinds of architecture.
sentences.chinese: 以网壳为支撑构架的玻璃采光顶使用广泛。

sentences.english: The daylighting condition of the bedroom also limitted the choice scope of floor color.
sentences.chinese: 居室的采光条件也限制了地板颜色的选择范围。

sentences.english: Central to the hotel tower floors is a light-flooded multi-storey winter-garden, which is facing to the south.
sentences.chinese: 酒店大楼拥有一跨越多层的南向采光温室。

sentences.english: This paper provides an experimental study on day lighting of office buildings.
sentences.chinese: 对办公建筑的天然采光进行了实验研究。

sentences.english: To the north, the architects placed two bedrooms and a study, all of which enjoy privileged sightlines.
sentences.chinese: 建筑师在北侧布置两间卧室和书房，其均有好的采光。

sentences.english: Daylighting, or more generally lighting, is one of the fundamental components of architecture.
sentences.chinese: 采光，或更普遍的照明，是建筑的基本组成部分。

sentences.english: The whole house was beautifully light and airy.
sentences.chinese: 整座房子的采光和通风都非常好。

sentences.english: Daylighting conditions of the clerestories also affected the appearances of these two kinds of paintings.
sentences.chinese: 而明窗内的采光条件也影响了两类作品的面貌。

sentences.english: Skylight small, poor lighting , let us feel like living in jail Lane.
sentences.chinese: 天窗很小，采光不好，让我们觉得像生活在囚牢里。

sentences.english: The void structure and daylighting by skylights inspire work and creation.
sentences.chinese: 挑空构造，天窗采光，激发工作与创作灵感。

sentences.english: Many glass lighting belts and glass skylights are on the roof.
sentences.chinese: 屋面上还有大量的采光玻璃带和玻璃天窗。

sentences.english: This diagram shows how the light reaches into the home from the exterior windows as well as the light wells.
sentences.chinese: 这张图表显示出光线如何通过外窗和采光井进入室内。

sentences.english: Daylighting is very good, after shining, not street noise.
sentences.chinese: 采光非常好，前后无遮挡，不临街无噪音。

sentences.english: Though not large, the room was light and airy.
sentences.chinese: 房间虽然不大，采光和通风却很好。

sentences.english: It exceeds the LEED standard for daylighting in schools.
sentences.chinese: 它超过了学校建筑LEED采光标准。

sentences.english: Technical route is "more lighting, less water used, new technology and high benefit".
sentences.chinese: 技术路线是“多采光，少用水，新技术，高效益”。

definition: variant of 陽臺|阳台[yang2 tai2]
configuration of rooms in a residence (e.g. 3BR 2 Bath)
drawing room (room for arriving guests)/living room/CL:間|间[jian1]
balcony/patio/flat roof/terrace/deck (unroofed platform)/outdoor stage/ancient imperial celestial observation terrace
